desc: All our soy wax scented candles are handmade using only 100% pure essential oils in our studio in Belfast UK. We use only natural ingredients in all of our soy wax candles we make. Relax and unwind with one of our natural candles burning realising them therapeutic aromas into your environment.

layout.text: Enjoy our range of scented soy wax candles infused with 100% pure essential oils.
